description: The film of your life. Imagine a movie that includes every day of the rest of your life… FEATURED on: Fast Company, MASHABLE, CNN, TED, BBC, & many more. For over 3 years now, I've been recording 1 second every day, so I'll never forget another day ever again. This project has had such a profoundly positive impact on my life, that I've passionately developed an App that will make it extraordinarily easy for anyone to do this too. Reliving every single day of my life at age 30 in 6 minutes has provided me with a treasured perspective on life. It holds me accountable for making each day count. When I turn 40, I'll have a 1 hour compilation that encapsulates my 30s. If I live to see 80 years of age, I'll have a 5-hour video that summarizes 50 years of my life. Features: + The App accesses any videos recorded on your phone & sorts them by date. You can also record your moment directly from the App. + Setup friendly reminders so you never forget a day! + Keep multiple timelines! You could have one for yourself… for each of your kids… your dinner… what you wear every day… etc! Looking forward to endless creative interpretations! + Backup your seconds with Google Drive! + Compile any given amount of time desired—the last month, year, or just select a start and end date. + Post your compilations directly to your social networks. + Your seconds are privately held on your phone. You never have to share this with anyone if you don't want to. The primary purpose of this App is to help you remember your own life. Sharing is optional.

description: Wheelie as far as you can without falling off and become a Wheelie God! Wheelie God is a simple to control, side-scrolling, wheelie game that is easy to play but difficult to master! Tap the screen to wheelie as far as you can and overcome the range of obstacles Wheelie God has to offer. As you wheelie further, see your bike get free upgrades for increasing difficulty.

The Nationwide Mobile Banking app makes it even easier to stay in control of your finances. It lets you quickly and easily check your balances and recent statements, move money between your Nationwide accounts and pay existing payees. Exclusively available to our Internet Bank customers, you can register and log in to the Mobile Banking app using your existing Internet Bank details. **Features** With the Nationwide Mobile Banking app you can: · View recent current account, savings, credit card and mortgage transactions & statements · Send and receive money securely using the Paym service · View your savings interest rates · View your personal loan balance · Manage your current account overdraft · Transfer money between your Nationwide accounts · Make payments to existing payees, now or on a future date · View and cancel Direct Debits and Regular Payments · Open Instant Access, Limited Access and Fixed Term savings accounts, and a range of Cash ISAs · Check your balance on your Android Wear Smartwatch by - opting into automatic daily balance alerts, or - requesting your balance on demand by saying "OK Google, Start Quick Balance", or - swiping through the menu on the SmartWatch ** App permissions ** When you install the app, you may notice it asks you for permission to access your phone's device & app history. This is a standard Android permission that the smartwatch feature uses to retrieve the balance from your device. The permission is only used if you opt into Quick Balance, and we *do not* use this permission to obtain any other data from your device. To use the app you’ll need: · To be registered for Nationwide Internet Banking · To download the app · To log in using your Internet Banking credentials including; your customer number, memorable data and passnumber or card and card reader · To give permission to access your contacts list to allow you to make a Paym payment from your contacts. We won't use the information for any other purpose and nothing will be stored by Nationwide. Once you’ve registered, you’ll only need your Internet Banking passnumber to log in. If you’re not yet a registered Internet Bank user, simply go to nationwide.co.uk/internetbanking and follow the on screen instructions to register. Once you’ve received your log in details, you’ll be able to download and use the Mobile Banking app. To check your balance on your Android Wear Smartwatch you'll need: · Android 4.3 or higher on your mobile phone · An Android Wear powered Smartwatch · To opt in to Quick Balance via the Mobile Banking app Staying safe Nationwide uses the latest security technologies to ensure that our customers are safe and secure when using the app. If you lose money as a result of fraud through our Mobile Banking service, we'll put the money back into your account immediately. This means that you won't lose a penny if we find that you have been the innocent victim of fraud. There are still a few things you can do to help protect yourself when using the app: · Never share your log in details with anyone · When logging on in a public place, be careful to keep your details out of sight · Create a password or PIN to access your device For details visit nationwide.co.uk and browse to the Mobile Banking Security section. Important information We won’t charge you for using this app but your mobile operator may charge you for some services such as data exchange, so please check with them. Terms and conditions for the Nationwide Mobile Banking app can be found at nationwide.co.uk under ‘Mobile Banking’. Contact us For details of how to contact us, please visit nationwide.co.uk and browse to ‘Contact us’.
release_text: Updated information for customers applying for a savings product through the app.

Writing prompts and exercises designed to help you get started with creative writing or to break through writing blocks. description: Come and take a journey into space with your Tiny Space Rocket through challenging gameplay! Dodge the UFOs to avoid blowing up your Space Rocket and use boosters to get a high score! Challenge your friends for the highest score on your leaderboard! Very addictive gameplay! Colorful graphics! How to Play: Move your Tiny Space Rocket up, down, and side to side by dragging it with your finger in an effort to dodge the UFOs and collect stars to trigger fever mode! Collect as many stars as you can to earn the highest score before time runs out! Tiny Space Rocket Features: ** Boosters ** Compete with Friends on the Leaderboard ** Fever Mode ** Exciting, Addictive Gameplay ** Amazing Space Graphics PLEASE NOTE: This game is free to play but does charge real money for additional content. You may adjust your settings to lock out this feature.

Dodge the mean pufferfish as you put the penguins in bubbles and save them from harm. Use boosters to get a high score! Challenge your friends for the highest score on your leaderboard! Very addictive gameplay! Colorful graphics! Exciting music! How to Play: Tap the penguins to put them in bubbles and collect stars to trigger fever mode! Collect as many stars as you can to earn the highest score before time runs out! Tiny Penguin Pop Features: ** Boosters ** Compete with Friends on the Leaderboard ** Fever Mode ** Exciting, Addictive Gameplay ** Amazing Arctic Graphics PLEASE NOTE: This game is free to play but does charge real money for additional content. Looking for a good Valentine's Day theme, but don't want the traditional "Hallmark" red hearts look? Love Birds may be just what you are looking for then. This is a love filled theme that won't feel out of place on the other 364 days a year on top of being perfect for the commercial holiday of affection. Go Launcher Ex has come on the Android scene by storm as the Launcher to use for theme connoisseurs. Allowing users to piece together various elements from different themes in order to create a personalized visual experience on their phone. When you call something a theme it can mean many things. To me a theme should change the entire visual appearance of your phone, at least as much as can be changed by that theme. So when I set out to create my Vindicated theme for Go Launcher Ex that was my goal. To create a compete theme. I use this as a base for all of my other themes iin order to give a better end user experience. This base allows a continuity to the theme connoisseur. While each new theme is unique, you'll be able to recognize your app icons easily if you use many of my different themes. -Over 300 metro style icons -unique page indicators -Fun Love Birds Wallpaper -Portrait and Landscape friendly Follow @MobileThemer on Twitter for assistance and updates

Say Hello to Mac Kitty for Go Launcher Ex! The Mac Kitty theme for ADW Ex is all about simplicity and understated design. The interface offers easy to read messages due to a high contrast mixture of White, Black, and Pink. Topped off with a bow recognized worldwide this theme is sure to become your default theme from now on. When you call something a theme it can mean many things. To me a theme should change the entire visual appearance of your phone, at least as much as can be chaged by that theme. So when I set out to create Vindicated for ADW Ex that was my goal. To create a complete theme. As an Android user you have the most control of your screen through the placement and use of widgets, so a good theme should provide the base for you to build on in order to create visual happiness. The key element of that base is icons, and this is where Vindicated stands apart from many others as a theme. - Over 1000 Android application icons skinned by this theme - Over 500 icons in the set - New icons added regularly

description: Проверено - ЦИФРЫ ДЛЯ МАЛЫШЕЙ полезны для первых контактов ребенка с азами математики. Знакомство с каждой цифрой в легкой, игровой форме с обратной связью и яркими иллюстрациями. Раскрась цифры всеми цветами радуги! Просто, быстро, интересно. Приложение интересно детям любого возраста, от самых маленьких, до умеющих считать, раскраска помогает детям узнать и запомнить символы с помощью ярких красок и интуитивно понятных действий. app_name: A History of the United States
description: A HISTORY OF THE UNITED STATES BY CECIL CHESTERTON WITH AN INTRODUCTION BY G. K. CHESTERTON The author of this book, my brother, died in a French military hospital of the effects of exposure in the last fierce fighting that broke the Prussian power over Christendom; fighting for which he had volunteered after being invalided home. Any notes I can jot down about him must necessarily seem jerky and incongruous; for in such a relation memory is a medley of generalisation and detail, not to be uttered in words. One thing at least may fitly be said here. Before he died he did at least two things that he desired. One may seem much greater than the other; but he would not have shrunk from naming them together. He saw the end of an empire that was the nightmare of the nations; but I believe it pleased him almost as much that he had been able, often in the intervals of bitter warfare and by the aid of a brilliant memory, to put together these pages on the history, so necessary and so strangely neglected, of the great democracy which he never patronised, which he not only loved but honoured. Read more...

description: This application enables you to calculate the interest incurred on any amount such as capital investments or loans. It allows the user to calculate the following types of interests: ● Simple Interest ● Compound Interest This application makes it relatively easy to compute the simple interest as well as compound interest by simply entering the values. The compound interest can be computed in different ways depending upon the compounding basis such as: ▪ Monthly ▪ Quaterly ▪ Annually So, no more need to remember tricky and lengthy formulae for calculating interest. With 'Interest Calculator', save more time and avoid lengthy calculations. Remember 'Time Is Money'.

Wired Equivalent Privacy (WEP) is a security algorithm for IEEE 802.11 wireless networks. This application enables you to genarate a WEP key for your wireless network. The strength of the key can be chosen by the user such as: ● 64-Bit ● 128-Bit ● 256-Bit This application makes it relatively easy to use a WEP key for your wireless network without having to enter it manually. In addition to WEP keys, the application also allows the user to generate WPA keys for better and enhanced protection.

The Strong Password Generator allows you to create random passwords that are highly secure and extremely difficult to crack or guess due to an optional combination of lower and upper case letters, numbers and punctuation symbols. Hint: Including numbers and punctuation in a mixed case password will generally create a more secure password, which would be exponentially harder to recover using a brute force password discovery method.

It’s been almost a year since the release of the first version of Cmoar VR Cinema. Fully satisfied, we’d like to proudly put the newest update in your hands - an update that changes the application beyond recognition. Cmoar Cinema key features: - Dynamic Lighting - LAN connection - All video formats support ( .mp4/.mkv/.avi/.mov/.ogg/ etc.) - Watching Youtube videos (1080p 2D) - Watching Youtube videos (1080p 3D) - 3D interface - Chromatic aberration correction - Auditorium variations - Automatic downloading of subtitles and posters - Possibility to add every movie to Favorites - Multitude of various settings (eg. FOV) - New 3D camera - Voice search - „Last-viewed” option Soon: - Seat selection - Gamepad support Cmoar VR Cinema gives you a whole range of possibilities. Apart from displaying the movies from your memory card, you can also display a video from your PC in any format you wish thanks to LAN connection. That’s not the end of good news. To make things even more exciting, we’ve added an option of automatic subtitles and posters downloading. The most distinctive feature is, however, the possibility to watch 2D and 3D movies directly from YouTube. We prepared for you youtube tutorials that should help you to resolve drift and LAN video streaming problems. We do hope you will find these videos helpful :) Drift Correction Tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eiqOViYncww ) LAN video streaming Tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KZs3_-GeCNQ ) Thanks for your support. Enjoy the app! :-)

description: Speed and Cunning, do you have what it takes? Avner is a game in which the player is a character named Avner, a hero trapped in a strange world and captured by a traveling circus. Luckily for him, he have some control over gravity and is able to create small power sources that can affect him or his environment. This is a 2D platform action-puzzle game in a 3D environment, similar to games such as Little big planet and Trine in its game mechanics but involves a puzzle part at its core. The game combined two main elements: The first one is a fast pace game that requires dexterity and speed The second element is a puzzle resolution game, in which the player has to figure out a solution and try at it until he overcomes the obstacle. Credits: Developed By : Doron Weiss and Gil Elnekave Published by: Corbomite Games (Executive Producer: Oded Sharon)

Download this FREE application and you’ll be on the leading edge of citizen crime prevention. Not only will you be promoting a safer community for your family and friends but also you may be entitled to receive a cash reward for your tip submissions! Since 1981, Metro Denver Crime Stoppers has been serving the community and Law Enforcement by providing a conduit for anonymous tips provided by the public to assist Law Enforcement. MDCS has paid out over $600,000 in awards and assisted Law Enforcement in arresting thousands of criminals. With this new technology the user has the ability to: • Send a video or photograph for easy tip submission. • Find the nearest police station using GPS and receive turn by turn directions. • Check the status of submitted tips. • View Metro Denver’s “Most Wanted”. • One touch calling directly to a Crime Stoppers Representative. • One touch email composition to submit an email tip. • View Metro Denver’s “Crime of the Week”. • Connect with Metro Denver’s Crime Stoppers Social Media Pages. • Receive notifications about crime related incidences in your community; including AMBER and MEDINA Alerts. Metro Denver Crime Stoppers collects none of your personal information. Your tips are completely anonymous. You are provided with a unique user name and password and the app collects your “Push Message” ID so you can receive real time alerts about your submitted tips. We don’t collect any of your contact information! If you like our App and would like to see your city develop something similar, contact your local Crime Stoppers Program and let them know about us! Please support the Metro Denver Crime Stoppers Mobile Application and use the share feature to spread the word about the App in your community!

Desk Clock Plus is the full featured version of the stock android clock program for your phone or tablet. While keeping the original look and feel of the 2.x stock version by displaying the battery level, current time, your local weather, Desk Clock Plus allows you to configure it for your needs whether that is a clock for your office or night stand. Almost all aspects of the clock can be configured. You can configure the background to rotate from images from a specific folder on your device, from albums from your Google Photo account or from the featured images from Google. You can also choose not to select a background and let your active wallpaper show though, or you can also download and select various themes (see the ‘Robot’ images) or create your own theme. You can also change the font colors, display a 12 or 24 hour clock or set the phone to silent when it’s docked. Desk Clock Plus' settings will allow you to choose if you launch a screen saver into the night clock mode or in to a slide show screen saver of the images you choose. Optionally, you can purchase an extension that will allow you to add additional buttons docks and choose your own applications to launch from Desk Clock Plus. Swipe left and right on the dock or on the time and weather to re-arrange the layout. You can also swipe the time and weather panels to reconfigure the clock's layout. Desk Clock Plus is the best application to use for your multimedia dock!

A very useful app for our Islamic and Muslim community to determine the proper days on which to observe the annual fast (Ramadan) and to attend Hajj, in addition to also know about other Islamic holidays and festivals. >> Calendar Features: • View current Islamic & Gregorian Calendar dates! • View a list of Islamic Events for any Year! • Convert dates from Gregorian to Hijri and Hijri to Gregorian! • 8 Beautiful Islamic Calendar Themes to select from! • Moon Phases can be viewed • Monthly Calendar mode • Read Yesterday's Verse of Hadith • Use Widget to see both the Hijri & Gregorian dates on your home screen • Universal App - Works with almost all Android Phones and Tabs! >> Islamic Calendar Widget - Lets you view the current Hijri calendar date, month, year and the current Gregorian date, month, year on the home screen of your Android device! >> Quran Verse of the Day - Shows you a random verse from the Glorious Quran every day. The app includes over 300+ Ayahs carefully chosen to motivate you. You can also set reminders to get daily notification. >> Hadith of the Day - Shows you a random hadith from over 300+ hadiths from the books of Bukhari, Muslim, Dawood, Tirmidhi etc. You can also set reminders to get notifications. >> You can also share Quran Verses/Hadiths via Facebook, Twitter, Email, SMS and Copy! >> Download It Now!

description: Power Hour is one of the easiest drinking games around. It's simple but effective. Power Hour Drinking Game is easy to use and gets the job done. The countdown won't stop if you close the app or turn your screen off. It uses the phone's notification system (loud whistle + vibrate) to let you know when its time to take a drink.

** This version is limited to 10 minutes so you can try out the app and make sure it works for your device and drinking needs ** ** Please support development and upgrade to the full version if you enjoy the app ** Power Hour is one of the easiest drinking games around. It's simple but effective. If you are the type of person that is looking for a power hour app, then you probably care more about doing a power hour then messing around with a crappy app. Power Hour Drinking Game is easy to use and gets the job done. The countdown won't stop if you close the app or turn your screen off. It uses the phone's notification system (loud whistle + vibrate) to let you know when its time to take a drink.

This application allows user to conveniently select photos from FlashAir and download to Android mobile devices. The usage is simple and straightforward： 1. Activate FlashAir Wireless LAN. 2. Your mobile device will auto connect to the Wireless LAN of FlashAir with the configured Wireless LAN SSID and KEY. 3. If wireless connection fails, a message dialog will show up. Click on the "settings" of this dialog box to change Flashair wireless SSID and KEY settings. You may configure the download folder in this setting page too. The default folder is "FlashAir_Download". 4. On successful wireless connection, you may select photos to download to the selected download folder of your device.

Blood Diamond is an action packed shooting game set on a remote planet where you're mining the land for diamonds and money. However other tribes want to mine the same planet and they have sent an army to over power you. Your mission is to kill all the advancing armies. You have four guns; a machine gun, a flame thrower, a rocket launcher and an artillery gun to strike from above. You select the gun by swiping the gun turret or by clicking the gun icon on the side of the screen. The more soldiers you kill, the greater the reward so you can upgrade weapons to help you kill more. Upgrade via the menu, but upgrade wisely for maximum impact.

Drawing games have never looked as fun or colorful as Dr. Doodle! Grab your pen and guide your circus ball to pick up the various objects around the level, think smart though because if you draw the wrong objects your ball will fall to hell! Draw lines to avoid moving objects and have danger roll by you, draw lines to save your precious ball and above all else think! You'll never enjoy a game more than you did Dr. Doodle!

Practice your jumping skills or just drive as fast as you like, but try not to smash the car up. If you do crash, don't worry, a quick reset will have your racing car fixed and as good as new. Don't forget to use the different camera angles, try the side camera for a cool view.

description: Fatty Dragon is HUNGRY! In this endless runner meets twitch platformer, Fatty is barreling nonstop across several environments looking to eat all the donuts it can find. Help it out by making sure it gets all of the regular donuts, flies through the big donuts, and doesn't fall to its death! Unlock stars that you can use to trade for power ups! description: Andriod division winner of 2011 Best App Ever Awards in the Educational Category. Recognized as "Top 8 Android Apps for Education" by Mashable.com. Lauded as "Top 10 Droid Apps for Education" by eSchool News. Defense and Brain Injury Center website BrainLine.org proclaims app as top "20 Life-Changing Andriod App for People with Brain Injuries." SimplyZesty ranks app as top "18 Educational Apps that put the 'Smart' into Smartphones." Selected by AT&T for nationwide promotion in 5,000 stores for Back to School campaign. Welcome to the future of learning! Flash Card Maker Pro™ is the most advanced learning application on the Android Market. Recognized as a top educational tool by national technological, educational and health organizations. This flashcards Android app was developed after months of research on multi-sensory learning techniques and is the only memory improvement application that is optimized for all Android pads, tablets, and mobile phones. This full featured flash cards application uses advanced gesturing and text-to-speech capability to provide users of all ages with a fully interactive brain building experience. Improve your memory at lightning fast speed using tried and tested multi-sensory training techniques utilizing all pathways of learning (visual, auditory, kinesthetic or seeing, hearing, touching) simultaneously. Use digital flashcards on your Android phone or tablet to teach children the times tables or how to read, to help students study for exams, learn a new language, practice vocabulary, or to prepare for an upcoming presentation. Easy-to-use features include: play multiple decks at the same time, shake to hide memorized cards during playback, navigate flash cards using finger gestures, shuffle, sort in multiple ways, track speed with timer, share decks via email, create or convert old flashcards for free using developer website, swap question and answer, backup flash cards database to SD card, and live audio playback in multiple languages using built in text-to-speech engine. Other uses and advantages of the app include: self-improvement and self-help, boost memory through high-tech memorization techniques, remember tasks and facts better with multi-sensory features, teaching children and kids math with subtraction and addition and the alphabet with letters like ABCs, use as a game or training aid to build your brain and study for tests. The most important feature of this app is the ability to read the flash cards out loud and talk back to the user facilitating auditory senses and the learning of new languages like Spanish, French, Italian, and German. Use the application to study or teach educational topics for the SAT, ACT, GRE, LSAT, MCAT, IQ tests, AP, TOEFL, PCAT, VCAT, HSPT, AHPAT, OAT, NCLEX, PRAXIS, MBE, FE, MPJE, and ASVAB etc... The app is ideally suited for training and practice for cognitive and speech therapy or learning disability. Targeted for all ages and grades including: adults, children, kids, college, university, kindergarten, elementary school, middle school, high school, graduate, Doctoral, Masters, PhD, and scientist.

Added on screen Menu for new devices lacking button. 8. Fixed Bug on Sort of Cards in Deck under Edit Tab.

description: WODBook is the best application you can get to keep track of your daily workouts. We took the task of logging your WODs and created an insanely beautiful experience, making it the best Fitness Application in the Android Market. With our latest version we are rising the bar for the WOD logging applications once again. With the new WODBook you can have access to your Box right at your fingertips at any time. This is the definitive tool for enhancing your Box community spirit. Share your activity with your Box members and compare your results with the world. Fitness competition has never got better. If you are one of those people who can not get enough, we are including the Pro version for you, adding the following special features: - theWOD Machine: This is the ultimate workout generator tool! This is not a random WOD generator or a WODs database, this is a smart and dynamic system which will learn from your logs and RMs to generate WODs specially for you! Fully customizable, scalable and with a deck of cards mode included, theWOD Machine is the most complete and powerful workout generator tool available in the market! If you are traveling, or can not make it to your Box, or just for the fun, theWOD Machine is for you! - Search your Activity by exercise: This is the best way to analyze your past workouts. Improve your WODs programming by analyzing your past by exercise. - Have access to Public Daily WODs: You can have access to all of the Daily WODs posted by any Box working with WODBook. - Search Daily WODs by exercise: Public Daily WODs gets even more interesting when you can do a search by exercise. - 1 Rep Max Calculator: We are including 7 different formulas for helping you calculate the RMs. for your personal records. Brzycki, Epley, Lander, Lombardi, Mayhew et al., O’Conner et al., Whaten, choose the one which works best for you. - Fully customizable Tabata, Stations and EMOM timers. With the most complete collection of timers we got you all covered. - Attach photos to your results, when creating Daily WODs, or Benchmark WODs. - Unlimited Box creations: Create as many Boxes as you want, use this feature to create different training groups or even competition leaderboards. Get WODBook and start tracking your workouts today! Full list of features: - See your Box Activity, compare your results with your Box members. - theWOD Machine - Smart WOD generator and Deck of cards. - Daily WODs Whiteboard. - Get WOD feeds from your Box. - Get Daily WODs from all the Boxes working with WODBook. - Join your Box or create your own if it doesn't exist. - Track your daily WODs by adding them to your WOD Calendar. - Enter results and notes for your tracked WODs. - Attach photos to your results. - Share your results with your Box, or use Facebook, Twitter or Google+ - Keep track of your favorite WODs. - Keep track of your benchmark WODs. - Search your activity by exercise. - Search Daily WODs by exercise. - Manage your personal records. - User Profile - Total finished WODs, Favorite WODs, Benchmark WODs and data analysis . - Get scales of your personal records. - Visualize your personal records progress history. - 1 Rep Max calculations for your records - including 7 different formulas - Track your results for the benchmark WODs ( Girls, Heroes, Travel WODs, Opens ). - Instructional videos for some of the best benchmark WODs and exercises. - Create your own benchmark WODs and share them to your Box. - Your data will be synced in real time across all of your devices. - Track and visualize each of your benchmark WODs history. - Training Timers are included ( StopWatch, Amrap, Tabata, Stations, EMOM ). description: *New Update* Leaderboards are now ready! Play free now to crush the competition and rule the ranks! TAPTOIDS: DON’T LET US DIE! Is a new free to play, time-based Earth defense arcade game where you play to defeat colorful planetoids headed to crush our home world. It is a super fun and challenging space-themed game with a high demand for hand-eye coordination. Be the master of time and space by surviving this chaotic galactic attack! Our cute little astronaut buddies, Rocky and Rover are floating in space, but can't get home until the Earth is free of any danger. They will cheer you on and keep you company while you play. This is how the game play goes: Tap the incoming planetoids with your fingers before they crush the earth. Some enemies are small and fast, while others might require more taps to defeat. Try playing one-handed while holding the device, or place it on a table or your lap to free up both hands. Playing with a stylus is fun too! SURVIVAL REQUIREMENTS: •Fastest fingers in the galaxy! •Master hand/eye coordination •Relentless endurance •The spirit of an eagle •The eye of the tiger •All that jazz FEATURES: •Free game! •No ads during game play •Designed for tablet and smart phone •Google Play Services Supported! •Leaderboards •Eye-catching graphics and particle FX •Exciting sounds and music •Adorable characters to cheer you on •Various planetoid enemy types Additional info: Having a problem? You can reach us at geeksplashgames@gmail.com

Based on A Song of Ice and Fire saga (also known as Game of Thrones), Westeros Conquest is a game using Risk's rules. This is a conquest game, where you play on a map of Game of Thrones (Westeros only is available for now), and fight against your enemies. Each kingdom is divided into several cities. Each player (including bot) can chose which house you want to represent. You can play with 2 to 8 players, with as many bots as you want. Soon you'll be able to play online with your friends, and player on new maps. Some features to improve gameplay will be added, alliances between houses according to their respectives histories.

This is version 2.1.1 and hopefully we get a new big feature every month. Community: www.reddit.com/r/prodnd Each item you purchase in our app is still being expanded and will only get better. So a big THANK YOU to ALL THOSE WHO PURCHASED anything so far. This is going on with your support :D What is PRODnD? ProDnD is a small app with a big premise: INFINITE DUNGEONS! It features cool random generator algorithms to generate completely original dungeons, giving the players and the DM more time to create immersive adventures and narration within the dungeon. It also allows you to create and place Events which are little tacks with note taking and management abilities. Create a goblin army and place them around if you want. or just take note of a narrative when adventurers enter the dungeon. You can duplicate, delete, edit or focus on existing Events, as well as moving them around on the map. With a selection of cool backgrounds you can set the game mood and themes at this point allow you change the basic colors of the tiles. As usual you can save/load, but now with a map name that you can edit as well! The new version should be compatible with older saves. Thanks for all the love and criticism so far, it makes our development efforts worthwhile. FEATURES: * Simple grid layout can be used for most tabletop RPG games such as D&D and Pathfinder. * Gray Lake's own ProD procedural dungeon generator engine and algorithms. * Create virtually unlimited variety of dungeons with highly adjustable properties. * Dungeons, Caves, Abandoned Mines, Mazes, Dwarf Villages, Round Rooms, Rocky Fields, Old Ruins * Variety of color themes. * Doors, Stairs, Walls, Floors, and the Abyss! * Print * save/load created maps * random dungeon name generator

description: The unique Carrom experience on your Android device! Carrom Deluxe is a popular game in South Asia that is similar to billiards. You can enjoy it alone or play with your friends. Check out the realistic 3D simulation, try the intuitive touch controls and play against a challenging AI. Game Features: - Play against your friends on the same device. - Play against the Bot in various difficulty levels. - Optimized for your device, for HD displays as well as small phones. - Enjoy realistic physics, first person gameplay and easy touch control. About Carrom: Carrom (also known as Carom, Carroms, Karom, Karrom) is a "strike and pocket" table game of Eastern origin similar to pool, billiards, snooker, crokinole, pitchnut and table shuffleboard. It is very popular in Nepal, India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka and surrounding areas. In the South Asia, many clubs and cafés hold regular tournaments. The Rules: You use the striker to pocket the chips of your color. The winner is the first one to pocket all of his chips after the red queen is covered by either player.

A newly redesigned theater lets you adjust the screen size and lighting. Do you like the front or the back row? No problem, Go Show lets you choose where you sit. With amazing consumer ready 360 video cameras coming to market Go Show will be there to let you re-experience the magic. Want to sit back on the beach from your last vacation? Go Show easily plays back your favorite immersive video. Trying to rent or buy a home on the other side of the globe? Virtualy tour real estate from your armchair. Step into the soda factory to play the most addictive puzzle game on the market. You are faced with the tasty task of transporting soda from our naturally flowing soda geysers to color-coded soda bottles. The gameplay is simple. Just drag your finger to move soda around the board. Red soda goes in the red bottle. Easy enough, right? Sure. At least until you have to mix the blue and yellow soda to fill the green bottle. This factory is outfitted with the latest in soda making technology. Slide that blue soda through the red Color Station, and we’ve got purple soda! We can even run that orange soda through a Splitter for more red and yellow soda! We’ll teach you the basics with some simple levels. Brush up on your color mixing facts, learn the intricacies of Splitters, and you’ll be an old soda pro in no time! But rest assured, we’ve got challenges for even the most seasoned soda veterans! *** Fizzy Factory Features*** -384 Challenging Levels! -Intuitive, smooth touch controls -Multiple board sizes to ratchet up the difficulty -Tutorials to help ease you into gameplay -Hints available to help get you through some of the more dastardly levels -Awesome music and sound effects -Game Services leaderboard and achievements that allow you to compete against friends and strangers for mixing supremacy -Charming colorful graphics and animations -Real soda factory feel -Fun messages at the end of every level ***There's More!*** Beat the Fizzy Factory Secret Password Challenge and have your name immortalized! Details at HangZone.com. Fizzy Factory takes color-dragging puzzles to a new level. It’s free, so you’ve probably started downloading it by now. Good luck!

description: *NEW* Lullaby mode, perfect if you need to get your infant to sleep at night, couple it with the night light mode to maximise the effectiveness! If you like Baby White Noise and Play, just hit the "Rate Me" blue button on the main menu to leave a rating and review, High ratings and reviews help keep this application free! Baby White Noise and Play has been designed to take out the need for separate baby white noise and baby play apps, it's must have for any parent! Help your baby relax, stop crying, and sleep better. Includes perfectly looped sounds that your baby will love. This sleep aid has proven to console and pacify fussy infants and has been recommended to soothe children and is perfect for nap time and bedtime. Tired of having to stop playing white noise just to be able to put the night light on? Baby White Noise and Play will allow you to do both and more. VISUAL - Provides moving images for your baby to focus on. INTERACTIVE - Toys that you and your child can play with, helping in their development and learning. SOUNDS - White Noise to help soothe your baby to sleep or if suffering from colic, highly effective with different variations of some sounds in case one type doesn't work for your baby. LIGHTS - A simple night light is provided as well as an innovative "Red Light" function, used mainly by astronomers to keep their pupils from shrinking while looking at star charts at night, this light has an added effect that it doesn't disturb your baby while they are sleeping, allowing you to keep the white noise on while checking your child as they sleep. Baby White Noise and Play helps your child sleep by blocking distractions while relaxing and reducing stress. Even when your baby is asleep, the brain is constantly scanning and listening for sounds. If it’s too quiet, unwanted noise such as a parent walking into the room or another child playing may interrupt your baby’s sleep. White Noise generates sounds over a wide range of frequencies, masking those noise interruptions, so your infant can not only fall asleep, but also stay asleep. It also helps in their development with the aid of toys that helps them interact with technology as well as other sounds. You can move between different menus and use different parts of Baby White Noise and Play without the sounds being stopped, however, there is a "Stop audio" button if you do want to stop the background noise however. White Noise sounds similar to static of an analog TV or radio station that has stopped broadcasting. The name is derived from white light, which is what the human eye sees when all the colors that make up the visible light spectrum are combined. Blend a red, green, and blue light together and you'll get white light. You probably have noticed if you're in a brightly lit room filled with white light, it is difficult to see colored lights. That's because those individual colors get masked by surrounding white light. In the same way, white noise has equal energy at all sound frequencies to which humans are sensitive. Other sounds will get masked by white noise so they become less detectable. Baby White Noise and Play is always being added to and suggestions are always welcomed for new additions! Developed by a devoted father to a very beautiful baby girl who helped in the design of Baby White Noise and Play. If you like Baby White Noise and Play, just hit the "Rate Me" blue button on the main menu to leave a rating and review!

description: The sequel to Animal Chess is HERE! Dino Chess - The only Chess where the Dinosaurs really come alive! Control an army of dinosaurs and battle your friend in the Epic Chess Battle! Plan, strategize and choose from an arsenal of lightning, asteroids or even TNT. Watch how your Dinos literally destroy the enemies! Playing Chess has proven to help exercise both sides of the brain, increase one's IQ and helps in increasing problem-solving skills. However, many a times, children and even adults find it challenging to learn as there are many rules and a lack of interactivity and animation. No worries. Dino Chess is designed by educators to help you pick up and learn chess easily. It is infused with dinosaurs, animations, explosions, lightning, asteroids, TNT etc to help learning chess fun and easy. Imagine the fun of watching how your Queen Tyrannosaurus zapping the Stegosaurus Bishop with lightning or the Rook Quetzalcoatlus check mate the King Triceraptor with fiery asteroids! Learning chess can never be so much fun! Start bonding and playing Dino Chess with your kids today! These are some of the reviews of Dino Chess users: "I am impressed ! The dinosaurs come alive and I am actually controlling them! I didn't know chess can be so much fun " - Joshua 10 years old kid "I like the lightning zaps and asteroid explosions when I exterminate my opponent! " - Isaac 7 years old kid "I like to design my dinosaur's color and chess board " - Samuel 6 years old kid "My 7 year-old son son actually stopped playing silly games and he is now enjoying playing Dino chess with me!" June So help your child to improve problem solving skills, increase memory and creativity, planning and foresight . And most importantly, use Dino Chess to bond with your child and teach them useful values.
release_text: 4 Different Gameplay to choose from: #1 : Play the classic Dino Chess Edition #2 : Play the Last Dino Standing Edition #3 : Play the Special Dino Chess Edition - Amazingly Fun and addictive! - You cant find any chess like this ! #4 : Interactive Dino Safari with all your Dino armies

Designed to work all around the world, in all denominations, Teacher’s Class EXPENSES helps you maintain your expenses in a quick and easy format. This app is marketed in the Teacher’s Class series of teacher related apps, but can be used by anyone who wants to keep track of spending. All of the following is provided: • Creation of individual expense records • Insert each expense record’s value and date • Optional insertion of expense type • Optional insertion of notes on the expense • Customizable expense types to select for each record • Review all expenses in a customizable list • E-mail yourself a list of expense records • E-mail yourself a detailed individual expense record There is a lot of functionality built in Teacher’s Class EXPENSES. Do you need to separate your expenses into reimbursable and non-reimbursable? Simply select your specific expense type! Need to see a total of all your reimbursable expenses? Already displayed on the list view! Want to e-mail yourself the records? Tap the e-mail button and they're on their way! The professional version allows you to store multiple classes and has higher limits of the total number of tests/assignments/homework allowed to be saved. description: System Requirements: Minimum 1GB of RAM to run A puzzle adventure game. Play the role of Leona in this story driven 'Touch to Play'. Take your time and explore the environment for clues to puzzles. Zoom in to detailed areas to find secrets that allow you to progress in the game. An adventure full of mystery, obstacles, enemies, stories, battles, puzzles, fun and comedy. Dungeon Lurk 2 takes place hundreds of years before the first dungeon lurk. Even more magic is ever present in this dark depth of a dungeon. Ceghran, The Dread King, has constructed a dungeon kingdom to house his lords, accumulate souls, create magical artifacts and form dreadful legions. Ceghran has his lords collecting souls to reconstruct his being. If Ceghran is successful in becoming whole, the world will be in anguish. It's now up to you to stop Ceghran and his Lords from causing mayhem across the realm. Complete with Built-Out 3D environments. Easy to Control, Graphic Intensive Artwork, Puzzles, Coin Collection, Sound Effects, Random Loot, Random Puzzles, Random Stories, Random Spawns, RPG Style, Progressive Elements.

MARA3D (Mobile Art Reference App) is the ultimate real-time 3D app for human anatomy reference! This app features unlimited 3D viewing angles, pinch, pan & zoom, beautiful female 3D models, multiple layers of detail and a gorgeous real-time dynamic lighting system. If you are a beginner or an advanced artist this is a must-have app! MARA3D produces simple to use, elegant, high quality, mobile 3D reference apps that assist with drawing, sculpting and study at a price point everyone can afford. Designed to be kept running while you work, our apps act as a supplement to your primary drawing or sculpting applications, and eliminate unwanted desktop clutter. MARA3D (Mobile Art Reference Apps) Transforming the way you get your reference, by artists for artists! Like us @ www.facebook.com/mara3d Follow us @ www.twitter.com/mara3dapps Newsletter @ www.mara3d.com FEATURES 4 Layer Modes - Skin - Grey Écorché - Color Écorché - Silhouette 6 Female Models - 4 standard poses - 2 artistic poses Intuitive gesture-based navigation - Full 3D real-time orbiting - Zoom (in / out) Pan (left /right) - Beautiful Real-time dynamic lighting Interface tools include - Grid - Camera Reset - Camera Snapshot 2 Modes - Portrait - Landscape --------------------------------- MARA3D (Mobile Art Reference Apps) Transforming the way you get your reference, by artists for artists! www.facebook.com/mara3d www.twitter.com/mara3dapps www.mara3d.com
release_text: - updated new interface - updated new lighting system for more precise control - updated orbiting to be more precise - updated static grid to dynamic grid - updated pan / zoom 1 second delay to avoid unintentional movements - updated camera snapshots to 9 slots - added real-time shadows - added camera lock mode - added tutorial mode - added exit app icon - optimized textures - optimized overall performance

description: MLS Real Estate Rental USA is a multiple sources Real Estate Rental property search Agent from MLSSearchEngine.com. This App is able to search for all kinds of rental properties - apartments, condos, townhouses, single family homes, duplexes and multiple family homes for rents or leases in the entire USA from multiple MLS (Multiple Listing Service) databases. Unlike other Rental Apps such like Realtor.com or Zillow which only search in their own database, this App actually works like a Real Estate Rental Agent which allows you to search and browse properties from multiple data sources. Instead of downloading, installing and searching back and forth between Apps from individual vendors while still missing out a large portion of listings out there, all you need is this Rental Agent App which gives you a portal to the entire rental market. The App has a very simple and friendly user interface. Enter a location, which can be a zipcode or a city/town and state and then optionally select one of more property types – Apt, Condo, Townhouse, SFH (single family home), MFH (multiple family home), price range, living space range, number of bedrooms and/or bathrooms then click the Search button and watch it navigates through data sources to bring you back all the listings to choose from. The listing summary screen contains a photo of the property, rental price, living space, number of bedrooms and bathrooms and a link to the Google map to view its location and a link to view more details about the property. Browse through the listings and add entries into a “My Picks” collection for future reference and management. From the “My Picks” screen you also have the choice to see all the picks on one map to compare their locations. Your search preferences are saved automatically to be used in the future. You can also specify whether to search in the exact town/city/zip code or to include nearby areas with a radius distance. The location box has an auto-complete feature allowing you to select from a list once you enter the first two letters of a town which saves you from typing its complete name. Whether you are looking to rent in a big city or a small town, let MLS Real Estate Rental USA help you find your next apartment or house anywhere in the USA!
release_text: Version 2.0 features a new rental search engine. 2.0.1 includes fixes for apartment complexes with multiple room units. 2.0.2 adds new features for Apartments, including displaying Apartment name and units with a range of bedrooms and bathrooms. It also allows for showing of up to 40 listings in a search.

The Headache Stopper provides fast, effective, drug-free relief from anxiety, and headaches (even migraines) in just minutes! This “tuning” process has been developed and refined for several years by the lead Physical Therapist at Maximum Function. His primary goal is to help people…period! Simple and Effective: The Headache Stopper is designed to be used alone or in combination with our simple to use “tuning tools” without the use of drugs or other medicines! How it Works: The Headache Stopper eliminates pain by “re-tuning” the nervous system. Stress is the trigger that causes most headaches and migraines. The Headache Stopper method attacks stressed nerves by tuning the nervous system through visual, audio, and humming soft tones to interrupt the pain pathways and restore your peace of mind and body. Usage: Gently place tip of tongue between front teeth. Tap the screen to hum along to a pleasant note sequence. Tap the screen again to stop. 60 seconds is usually sufficient. Users are encouraged to try the app until they become comfortable with the exercise. Repeat daily. Use at the start of a headache, or when a headache is likely to occur soon. Customize: Use the supplied peaceful images; include your favorite images from your camera roll; or both. Choose a comfortable amount of time to hum to each note. Choose a comfortable amount of time to breathe between each note. Testimonials: “Before narcolepsy diagnosis, neuralgia, and, what I think was shingles that caused such severe nerve pain in my arms, I stayed active with exercise. These series of events really knocked me down in different ways...and quite severely. The narcolepsy diagnosis created a bad depression and I hardly left my bed for a year. My body got softer and was more prone to sprains than before. I tried to get back into the habit of exercising but when the neuralgia hit, it seemed impossible to keep a routine. Plus, the more I did when I could, the more muscles I seemed to sprain. Each sprain was a few months of recovery. So for the last 3 years exercise has been hit and miss. The snowball effect of the neuralgia pain eventually made it so every time I exercised I got a migraine within about 20 minutes. In spring of this year I pretty much gave up on exercise. There were a couple of times I did give it a try but my anxiety about the pain to come was so overwhelming. I have had very little exercise for about 6 months. I had an overwhelming urge to get on the elliptical today. I even tried to talk myself out of it, but my urge was too strong. About 15 minutes into it my anxiety started to climb. My body went into auto pilot mode and started doing the humming/tuning app. I would run through it a few times, find relaxation, then stop. Every few minutes the anxiety would creep up and I would hum/tune again, and repeat until my 30 minutes was up. With grateful tears I am happy to report that I came out of this without a migraine. I do have a mild ache in the side if my face, but it's mild. I am SO excited! I know this is only day one, but I feel hopeful that I can find a consistent routine again. Thank you!” “I will try to explain some of my thoughts as a patient with experience in using guided imagery, meditation, biofeedback, etc. […] Have you listened to other guided relaxation Apps before?? You've done a wonderful job in creating one. At first I had to breathe the tones out as I memorized them and began to start out slowly due to pain making my nervous system hyper. And I'm able to recall those tones during a flare up when I don't have the App on which helps calm me down. ” ***Disclaimer*** This app cannot substitute the advice resulting from a consultation from a trained medical practitioner.

Quick access to survey information and statistics from the USAID-funded Demographic and Health Surveys. The DHS Program has carried out more than 300 surveys in 90+ countries. The surveys collect information on fertility and family planning, maternal and child health, child mortality, nutrition, malaria, HIV/AIDS, and many other health topics. The DHS Program application provides indicator tables, charts, maps, and trend data from the Demographic and Health Surveys, as well as survey information, and quick links to survey-related publications. The DHS Program application was formerly named MEASURE DHS Mobile. Keywords: MEASURE DHS, USAID, demographic, health, surveys, data, The DHS Program
release_text: Version 1.3 New Name, Same Quality. MEASURE DHS is now The DHS Program! Our new name reflects the broad range of activities we have done in the past 30 years and will continue to undertake with USAID including a greater emphasis on capacity strengthening throughout the survey process. Version 1.3 also has bug fixes.

description: We colour deep space! Now works with ACCELEROMETER! This is a FREE version to install before if you want to see how it behaves on your device. It is expected that soon we improve and we optimize the version. Only for OpenGL 2.0 devices. Recommended device with at least 500 MB of RAM. ATTENTION: Confirmed some BUGS in some devices: - If our LWP is stablished and newly you go to "Settings"/"Change Wallpaper" screen of our LWP and press over "Change Wallpaper" or go back, our LWP freezes or stripes appears. Is a problem with some GPUs. While I resolve, provisional solution is change to other wallpaper. Then, change newly to our LWP with settings stablished. Usually no problems then!!!!
release_text: 13th June: First Version. 17th June: Second version, better in performance. Better planet an moons textures. Corrected -> - If you press over "Change Wallpaper" before our LWP is fully charged, our LWP doesn't load. 18th June: Double tap opens settings page. Better setting pages with links. 19th July: Better skies, planet textures and meteorits that impact!

description: Deciding when to buy and sell stocks is difficult enough - figuring the profit/loss from that trade shouldn't have to be. Our FREE SGX stocks calculator does it for you! Simply enter your buy/sell price, share quantity and select your brokerage firm - your contract price is calculated without the hassle of remembering your broker's charges! It gives you the resulting profit/loss amount and %, and also breaks down all those multiple fees and charges (CDP fee, SGX fee, broker's fee and GST!) Break even calculation is also provided so you to know what is your minimum sell price. BEST of all, if you have an expected profit target to achieve, just input the desired profit % and our stock calculator instantly recommends you the price to sell! FEATURES: • Calculates total purchase price • Recommends minimum sell price to break even • Calculates profit/loss amount and % BENEFITS: •Easy three-step use (1. key price 2. key quantity 3.select broker) • Detail breakdown of fees in result screen • Able to calculate for IPO Stocks • Wide range of Singapore brokerage firms • Able to customize your own broker • Auto calculation of decimal places base on price input • Last used configurations will be auto-saved BROKERAGE FIRMS INCLUDE: CIMB, Citibank, DBS Vickers, Kim Eng, Lim&Tan, Philip (POEMS), iOCBC, UOB Kay Hian, DMG Partners and Standard Chartered. CONTACT: For questions/issues/suggestions, please write to dayworksfeedback@gmail.com instead of commenting below. Alternatively click 'Feedback' under Options within the app to instantly email us. LIKE our facebook page at www.facebook.com/dayworksco to be notified of new developments! SOME FEATURES IMPLEMENTED BASE ON YOUR INPUTS! *Contract Value now shown in Result Table *Last used configurations are auto-saved *Negative result shown as red, positive in green *Break Even Forecast *Price vs profit forecast projection ..and many more If you feel you have benefited from this app, please RATE US and SHARE OUR APP WITH OTHERS! ***DISCLAIMER*** While there is no reason to believe that the calculators are unreliable, no liability is accepted for any errors or inaccuracies. All calculations in this application are based on user inputs and do not reflect any guarantee of earnings, financial savings, tax advantages or otherwise. These calculators are not intended to provide investments, legal, tax, or accounting advice. Keywords: Singapore, SG, SGX, Stocks, Finance, Calculator, Shares, Buy, Sell, Profit, Loss, Contract, Free, CIMB, Citibank, Citi, DBS Vickers, DBS, Kim Eng, KE, Lim & Tan, L&T, Lim, Tan, Philip, Poems, iOCBC, OCBC, UOB Kay Hian, UOB, DMG Partners, DMG, Standard, Chartered, Standard Chartered, CDP, GST, broker, brokerage, break even, Investment, day trading

Our goal at the Spine Physicians Institute has always been to put the patient’s interest above everything else. By educating the public about various spine related conditions and treatment options, such as minimally invasive spine surgery, physical therapy and more we feel that they are able to make more informed decisions as it relates to their health. This app is a resource that includes information about spine conditions and treatment options as well as advanced spine health questionnaires designed to help provide our patients with information about how we can get you living a happier healthier pain free lifestyle. Read testimonials, watch expert videos from expert spine surgeons, take the spine evaluation quiz, upload your MRI for expert review and even schedule an appointment without ever leaving the app!

description: 跟你的小伙伴一起挑战谁是最强大脑！ 全新玩法，如果你能挑战3000分，那你就是天才！ Together with your little partner who is the strongest challenge to the brain! The new play, if you can challenge 3000 points, you're a genius!

Acertijos y Adivinanzas 2 es un juego con un conjunto de juegos mentales y acertijos de ingenio para pensar (más de 200 acertijos, entre jeroglíficos, series matemáticas, pensamiento lateral, adivinanzas, ...), para usar el cerebro (Brain Games). Al ser este un juego de acertijos y enigmas, está pensado y orientado para personas que deseen potenciar y ejercitar su cerebro. En este juego podrás encontrar los siguientes tipos de acertijos y enigmas, categorizados como sigue: ★ Acertijos matemáticos ★ Pensamiento lateral ★ Jeroglíficos ★ Series matemáticas ★ Test de Razonamiento ★ Test de Dominó ★ Test: ¿Eres ambicioso? ★ Test: ¿Eres un líder? ★ Test: ¿Eres tolerante? ★ Test: ¿Tienes ansiedad? ★ Adivinanzas ★ Brain Games 1: Enlace hacia nuestro juego Brain Games. ★ Brain Games 2: Enlace hacia nuestro juego Brain Games 2. Intenta resolver todos los retos que te proponemos. Los hay de diferentes dificultades. Reta a tus amigos y comprueba quién obtiene más puntos. Entretenimiento y risas aseguradas, sólo y en grupo, ya que algunos acertijos te harán reír al conocer su respuesta. Todos los acertijos y enigmas vienen con solución. Esperamos que os guste este juego de acertijos, adivinanzas y juegos mentales. Si te ha gustado el juego, no te olvides de darnos un +1, y de decírselo a tus amigos y en tus redes sociales, y escríbenos una opinión en Google Play. SOBRE EL USO DEL JUEGO: Por el tipo de acertijos que contiene este juego, no tendrás que escribir las respuestas. Sólo tendrás que pensar en ellas, y ver si coinciden con la solución. No se pueden escribir porque los acertijos pueden tener respuestas largas y variadas, y no es posible programar un chequeo de los textos por esta razón. Sin embargo, en las Series Matemáticas y en el Test de Razonamiento, donde si es posible dar una respuesta concreta, tenéis activada la opción de responder y el juego chequea si habéis acertado o no. JUEGO EN GRUPO: Prueba a jugar en grupo. Si puedes conectar el móvil o la tablet a un televisor, este juego es ideal para las fiestas y los grupos de amigos. También promete gran diversión para los usuarios que jueguen en solitario. OTROS DATOS DE INTERÉS - Lanzamiento del juego: 23-dic-2013 Puzzles and Riddles 2 is a game with a set of mind games and riddles of wit to think (over 200 riddles, between hieroglyphics, mathematics series, lateral thinking, riddles, ...), to use the brain (Brain Games). Since this is a game of puzzles and riddles, it is designed and oriented for people who want to strengthen and exercise your brain. In this game you will find the following types of puzzles and riddles, categorized as follows: ★ mathematical puzzles ★ Lateral thinking ★ Hieroglyphics ★ Math Series ★ Reasoning Test ★ Test Domino ★ Test: Are you ambitious? ★ Test: Are you a leader? ★ Test: Are you tolerant? ★ Test: Do you have anxiety? ★ Riddles ★ Brain Games 1: Link to our game Brain Games. ★ Brain Games 2: Link to our game Brain Games 2. Try to solve all the challenges we suggest. They come in different difficulties. Challenge your friends and see who gets more points. Entertainment and guaranteed laughs, and group only, as some riddles will make you laugh to know your answer. All come with riddles and puzzles solution. We hope you enjoy this game of puzzles, riddles and brain teasers. If you like the game, do not forget to give us a +1, and tell your friends and your social networks, and write us a review on Google Play. ON THE USE OF THE GAME: For the type of puzzles that contains this game will not have to write the answers. You only have to think about them and see if they match the solution. You can not write because the puzzles can be long and varied answers, and you can not schedule a checkup of the texts for this reason. However, in the Series in Mathematics and Reasoning Test, which if possible give a concrete answer, you have enabled the option to respond and the game checks if you have successful or not. GAME GROUP: Try playing in groups. If you can connect the phone or tablet to a TV, this game is great for parties and groups of friends. It also promises great fun for users to play alone. OTHER DATA OF INTEREST - Launch of the game: Dec 23, 2013

Animal Puzzles is a jigsaw puzzle game for kids from 0 to 4 years old. ✚ Kids love puzzles and jigsaw games. They will love this game too. ✚ Animal Puzzles is perfect for helping your children to distinguish the animals by their shapes and silhouettes, according the colored pictures. ✚ With this game your children will train their hand-eye coordination. ✚ Your children will improve their space capabilities, because they will have to do changes of size and rotation in their minds, in order to put the animal into the correct place. ✚ The funny pictures make that solving the puzzle be a fun game to play. ✚ Your children will learn playing this game. Totally recommended for your kids !! Features ★ 7 puzzles with different places: Farm, Sea, Countryside, Jungle, Jurasic, North Pole, Desert ★ 1 hidden animal to guess: Dinosaur ★ Different animals for each place ★ From 0 to 4 years old ★ Easy to learn and control If your children liked this game, give us 5 stars and a +1, and leave us a review on our Google Play index card.

In this game you have to capture a frog who lives in a little pond. The frog wants to leave the pond, and you have to avoid this. Capture the Frog trying to isolate it in the middle of the pond. You have to tap in the acuatic plants to disappear them. The frog can only go jumping from one plant to another plant. There are 5 difficulty level, and each level is generated in a random way, so you are going to have fun forever. This game are going to give you lots of fun. You will have fun. Sure !!

Learn the vowels is a game for toddlers where the kids will learn the vowels in 5 languages, using a simple and intuitive interface, including a funny animation. Xylophone and Piano for Kids is a funny game that emulate the xylophone for kids, toddlers and preschools. Your kids will make their own musical arrangements. Xylophone and Piano for Kids has tow sounds: 1. Xylophone sounds 2. Piano sound Furthermore, in this game you will find another two games, two mini games for toddlers and preschools, so you will have all you need for your kids in only one app. Mini game #1: Your toddlers and preschools have to click over the kids appear in the screen, in a small neighborhood. The game has no end. With this game, your kids will work their attention and the response velocity, and they will learn about the use of your mobile (phone or tablet) in a funny and practical way. Mini game #2: The train. This mini game emulates to the usual toys you can find in a typical toy store, and you give to your kids in order they can play in their playground. This game is a train with 4 windows and 4 animals with their pictures and sounds. Your kids have to press over the switch or button to open the window and listen the animal sound, and click over the open window to close it. It works in the same way of the real toy. With this game your kids will beguin to differentiate the animals through the sounds and the pictures of them. Both mini games have an nive background sound and a funny fx sounds.

description: Welcome to Card Deck! Play any card game you desire, with your very own pack of cards you can take with you anywhere you go. Features... well, 52 playing cards! Try to be Air Traffic Controller by managing Flights from runway landing to Take off. Flight mania experience where you take timely decisions in managing flights on Terminal, Maintenance, Refueling and taking off. Avoid Panic, keep your runway and sky safe from planes collision, Apply your time management and strategy skills in managing planes on Airport Runway. A blend of Air Control and Runway management. -----------Story Line------------ Help Airplane land at your airport before they run out of fuel. Direct them to the terminal to unload passengers, for Maintenance and to the fuel pit spot to prepare for their outbound journey. Then it is time for more passengers and a timely takeoff. Be aware as thousands of passengers depend on you! -------------Features & Guidelines----------------: * Touch & Drag planes to the runway and navigate accordingly * Multiple Maps and Catchy Backgrounds * 30 achievements to unlock * Smooth and addictive game play * Global high scores open feint integration ------------------------------------------------ Disclaimer: This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen. The required permissions are just for ads. Download PRO version completely Free of Ads.

description: Going shopping is a story and simple visual tool aimed towards children who have behaviors in stores caused by always wanting to pick out a toy or treat for themselves to buy. Perfect for preschool aged children, a visual learner or a child diagnosed with a social delay such as an autism spectrum disorder. ********** The app opens up to a simple visual tool that can be used to show and tell children before they enter a store if they do or don’t get to pick out a toy or treat. There are also instructions for using the app and a social story that explains good shopping behavior. The story focuses on fun things children can do in a store other than buying something for themselves. The story also explains the visual tool so the child knows when he/she does and does not get to pick something out for himself/herself. Going into a store or shop can cause difficult tantrum behaviors for any child, and may be particularly difficult for children diagnosed with an autism spectrum disorder, Down syndrome or other special need. The desire to buy something is the most common cause of these behaviors. Children with special needs often need more direct and visual instruction of what they can and cannot do or have. Teaching good shopping behaviors to any child may be easier and less stressful when visual supports, like social stories are used. This social story explains accurate information and ensures that your child will know what to expect when going into a store. Social stories are an important type of visual support often used with children diagnosed with an autism spectrum disorder, Down syndrome or other special need. Social stories were first defined by Carol Gray in 1991 and are commonly used to break down a task or social situation into small and easy to understand steps, often accompanied by descriptive pictures. Social stories are incredibly easy to implement and are used by many professionals for a wide range of behaviors.

Oil Reset Pro is the fastest and easiest way to reset any oil change reminder light! More than two decades and over 350 different models, including 2014 vehicles. This is the must have tool when it comes to changing oil and it’s always at your finger tips!! For the working technician or shop owner, we know that your time is money. This app was designed with you in mind by someone like you. Save up to 30 minutes a day running back and forth looking up reset procedures in your labor guides or flipping through a book. Have the assurance that your customer will not return a week later unhappy because you forgot to reset the maintenance light. How to use this app: Simply open Oil Reset Pro every time you get into a vehicle for service. Select year, make, and model, and there you have your reset procedure. If there is no procedure for the vehicle, then the vehicle doesn't have a maintenance reminder light. THAT’S IT! Check every car and don’t worry about one slipping by you again. http://www.oilresetpro.com Please reach out to us at info@uptopapps.com if you find any issues with the procedures that need corrections. We are aiming for perfection so your help is deeply appreciated in our pursuit for 100% accuracy. We are able to update our database immediately and will continue to add each new model year as they come out.

description: Календарь рыбака - это программа для Вашего смартфона, показывающая когда какая рыба ловится, а когда нет. Вот только 10 причин, чтобы установить в свой телефон наш рыболовный календарь: - он содержит максимальное количество рыб; - при его составлении мы проводили собственный анализ; - работая в телефоне он не требует интернет-соединения - и всегда под рукой; - у него удобный интерфейс - это не страница сайта с кучей ненужной информации по краям; - клев рыб представлен в виде сравнительных диаграмм в пределах дня; - вероятность клева определенного вида рыб представлена удобным графиком на месяц вперед; - календарь настраивается под те виды рыб, которые Вам нужны; - он бесплатен; - он обновляется, уточняется и увеличивается; - он не содержит рекламы. И это далеко еще не все - поставьте наш календарь рыболова на свой смартфон - и узнайте сами! Календарь клева - долгопериодический прогноз вероятности клева. На основании анализа научных данных об образе жизни различных видов рыб построены математические модели вероятности их улова в зависимости от: климатической зоны, времени года, относительного расположения Солнца, Земли и Луны (то-есть, фазы Луны). Список пород рыб, по которым строится Ваш персональный календарь - настраивается, так же, как и влияние Луны. Календарь рыбака позволяет определить, когда в ближайшем будущем стоит планировать выезд на рыбалку. Отображается четыре уровня вероятности клева рыбы - жор, хороший клев, плохой клев и нет клева. Просто и наглядно. Приложение полностью устанавливается в Ваш мобильный телефон и не требует интернета - это особенно ценно на выезде, где сеть не ловится - либо цены на передачу данных в роуминге не позволяют ей пользоваться. Приложение легко может быть перемещено на SD-карту - чтобы не занимать память телефона. Приложение не требует НИКАКИХ разрешений. Нам не нужны данные телефонной книги, списка вызовов, отправка СМС, интернет-сокеты и прочее! Calendar fisherman - a program for your smartphone, which indicates when the fish is caught, and when not.   Here are just 10 reasons to set your phone to our fishing calendar:  - It contains the maximum number of fish;  - It draws we conducted our own analysis;  - Working on the phone it does not require an Internet connection - and always at hand;  - It has easy to use interface - this is not web site with a bunch of useless information at the edges;  - Biting fish is presented as comparative charts within a day;  - The probability of a certain species of fish biting providing a convenient schedule a month in advance;  - Calendar set up for those species of fish that you want;  - It's free;  - It is updated, clarified and increased;  - It does not contain advertising.   And that's not all - put our fishing calendar on your smartphone - and see for yourself! Calendar Fisherman - Long-period forecast of the probability of catch. Based on the analysis of scientific data about the lifestyle of different fish species mathematical models of the probability of their catch, depending on: the climate zone, the season, the relative positions of the Sun, Moon and Earth (that is, the phase of the moon). List of fish species on which to build your personal calendar - set, as well as the influence of the moon. Fisherman calendar to determine when in the near future we plan to check out fishing. Displays four levels of probability of biting fish - Jordan, good bite, a bad bite and no bite. Simple and clear. The application is fully installed in your mobile phone and does not require the Internet - this is particularly valuable on the road, where the network is not caught - or the price of data roaming not allowed to use it.   Application can easily be moved to the SD-card - not to hold the phone.   This application does not require any permits. We do not need the phone book data, recent calls, sending SMS, web sockets, and so on!

description: Fishing forecast - a widget that will show you probability of fish catching today. At the core of our widget is application Fisherman calendar - long-period forecast for best fishing times. Our forecasts based on the analysis of scientific data about habits of different fish species. Mathematical models for the probability of catch, depends on climate zone, time of year, the relative position of Sun, Moon and Earth (that is, the phase of the moon). One's can setup list of fish species, and influence of the moon phases. The widget display probability percentage, and its dynamics over last day. Simple and clear. The widget is fully installed in your mobile phone and does not require Internet - this is particularly valuable in outdoor trips, where the network signal sometimes really bad. NOTE: the widget does not include daily movements of the Moon, altitude above the horizon, atmospheric pressure, precipitation, etc.

As Featured In The Washington Post, BBC, LA Times, CNN, Lifehacker, Fast Company's Co.DESIGN, and The Next Web "A Travel App That Practically Packs Your Bags For You" Never Forget Your ______ Again! PackPoint is a free travel packing list organizer and packing planner for serious travel pros. PackPoint will help you organize what you need to pack in your luggage and suitcase based on length of travel, weather at your destination, and any activities planned during your trip. Once your packing list is built and organized, PackPoint will save it for you, and then you can choose to share it with your friends and family in case they need help packing too. Punch in the city you're going to travel to, the departure date, and the number of nights you'll be staying there. PackPoint will organize a packing list and luggage checklist for your luggage that takes into account: - Business or Leisure travel - Activities you plan on doing - What you need for an international trip - Warm weather clothes - Cold weather clothes - An umbrella if the forecast calls for rain - If you're willing to repeat wearing basics like shirts and pants - If you will have access to laundry facilities Some expert packing organizer user tips: - Check out the Customize menu within PackPoint for PackPoint's Premium features - Connect PackPoint to TripIt and create your packing lists automatically! - Put the PackPoint widget on your home screen - Swipe to remove packing list items - Tap to the right of each item to change its quantity - Pack smart to avoid airline luggage overage fees - Create a luggage checklist now, and then edit it later as you pack Have a feature request or feedback? Visit http://ideas.packpnt.com or e-mail info@packpnt.com Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/packpoint Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/packpnt @packpnt
release_text: PackPoint can now send a magical packing fairy to pack for you. Well....maybe not, but wow, wouldn't that be cool! We've also split toiletries out into their own category to make your packing list a bit easier to use.
